project.title: [Client Redacted] - ADP Payroll Systems Migration

challenge.summary: Consolidate and migrate ADP payroll operations across 9 locations with distributed workforce, while supporting legacy smart-factory infrastructure and integrating with centralized ERP systems.

solution.summary: Strategic approach to payroll system consolidation and migration:
deliverables: ADP payroll system implementation and migration across 9 locations
Citrix Desktop streaming for distributed workforce access
Active Directory integration for centralized authentication and SSO
Legacy system decommissioning and data archival
Fail-over testing and disaster recovery documentation
Staff training and transition support for new payroll workflows

outcomes: ✅ Payroll consolidated across 9 locations into single platform
✅ Citrix streaming deployment for distributed workforce
✅ Active Directory integration and SSO implementation
✅ Improved payroll accuracy and processing time
✅ Reduced operational complexity and IT overhead
✅ Seamless transition with zero payroll disruption
